name: WELFARE INDIA CHARITABLE TRUST

address: 17TH CROSS, GOVINDAPURA MAIN ROAD, ARABIC COLLEGE POST

briefDescription: herewith explaining what we done already.1. free medical checkup and dental camp and free medicine distribution at manjanady mangalore. more than 300 poor needy people utilised this camp.2. builted a house and handovered to needy poor orphan women and her 5 childrens at pavoor, manjeshwar, kasaragod district of kerala3. launches the nationwide legal literacy programmes to womens and childrens and common people and also inaugurated free legal aid centre at bangalore as a part of this programme. on 14th february of this year Justice Santhosh Hegde inaugurated the said centre.4. on 23rd april 2014 there will be another free medical and dental check up camps and free medicine distribution camp fixed at Suribail village of Dakshina Kannada.
